MAIN_MESSAGE: SP Energy Networks apologise for any inconvenience caused by the power cut affecting customers in the L14 postcode area of Liverpool. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 5.50PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.45PM on 18th March 2021.
